summary: Water quality is stable but pH is slightly elevated compared to averages. Temperature is lower than average.

insights.recommendation: Consider adding pH-lowering agents if pH exceeds 7.2.
Monitor TDS; maintain levels below 400 ppm for optimal plant growth.
Ensure water temperature remains between 24-28°C for tilapia health.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.037 / 7.012 / 7.106 (trend: down)
• TDS avg/min/max: 328.235 / 307.8 / 337.4 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.661 / 23.56 / 29.62 °C (trend: down)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
